north_star: Create an exceptional development experience by providing robust tools, environments, and processes that enable developers to work efficiently and productively.
mission: To enhance the developer experience by providing streamlined development environments, tools, and processes that facilitate efficient and productive software development.
vision: To establish a development ecosystem where every developer has the tools and support needed to innovate and deliver high-quality software quickly and efficiently.
values_principals: Developer Productivity: Focus on enabling developers to work efficiently.
Usability: Provide intuitive and easy-to-use tools and environments.
Consistency: Ensure consistent development environments and processes.
Collaboration: Foster a collaborative development culture.
Continuous Improvement: Continuously improve the developer experience.

team_structure.title: Team Lead
team_structure.responsibilities: Oversee team operations, prioritize tasks, and ensure alignment with broader goals.

team_structure.title: Developer Tools Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Develop and maintain development tools and environments.

team_structure.title: CI/CD Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Integrate CI/CD tools and processes into development environments.

team_structure.title: Developer Advocate
team_structure.responsibilities: Collect feedback from developers, advocate for their needs, and work on improving the developer experience.

team_structure.title: Documentation Specialist
team_structure.responsibilities: Create and maintain comprehensive documentation and knowledge bases.

priorities: Enhance and maintain development tools and environments.
Integrate CI/CD tools and processes seamlessly.
Collect and act on developer feedback to improve experiences.
Ensure consistent and intuitive development processes.
Foster collaboration among developers and teams.

meeting_cadence.purpose: Quick updates on progress, blockers, and plans for the day.
Plan the work for the upcoming sprint.
meeting_cadence.attendees: Team Lead, Developer Tools Engineers, CI/CD Engineers

meeting_cadence.purpose: Reflect on the past sprint and identify areas for improvement.
Team coordination and updates on ongoing projects.

performance_metrics.justification: High satisfaction indicates an effective and positive developer experience.
High adoption rates indicate that tools are useful and effective.
performance_metrics.measurement: Percentage of developers using provided tools.

performance_metrics.justification: Efficient onboarding reduces time to productivity for new hires.
performance_metrics.measurement: Average time from hire to full productivity.

performance_metrics.justification: Efficient CI/CD pipelines improve development productivity.

service_level_agreements.SLA: Initial response within 15 minutes, 90% of issues resolved within 4 hours.
Provision development environments within 1 business day.
